comment: Extension by continuity. Proposition 11 of [BourbakiTop1] p. II.20. Given a topology ` J ` on ` X ` , a subset ` A ` dense in ` X ` , this states a condition for ` F ` from ` A ` to a space ` Y ` Hausdorff and complete to be extensible by continuity. (Contributed by Thierry Arnoux, 4-Dec-2017.)
